title: 1 RP
body:
riot plz i need ur help.... i just need 1 RP no plz help me can i plz just get 1 rp?{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
i want scorched earth xerath which means i have 1349. can i plz have just 1 rp

replies.body: You should be able to get that. Either make a support ticket or head on over to the Misc. boards. The reds are more active over there.
you can email riot for the one rp my friend got 3 rp for night hunter rengar skin
